website_summaries.verdict: These easy-to-use and accurate urine strips are perfect for anyone on the keto, paleo, Atkins, or a low carb diet.
pros: Urine test strips work quickly to tell users whether they’re currently in ketosis, giving results in as little as 20 seconds
Formulated by doctors for top-shelf quality
Compact bottle that is easy to travel with, comes with 100 strips
cons: Strips only have a shelf life of 6 months (unopened)

customer_reviews.title: Keto great buy
customer_reviews.text: I am using my first bottle and so far the results match my blood meter. This is a great purchase. Will buy more. Second round of Keto and 4 days in showing some ketones. Great tool for accountability. I am not paid to review anything. My honest thoughts.
customer_reviews.author: Rachelbeth6

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: My other keto strips sometimes don't change color or are very light. I'm on the keto diet and losing weight but like to see the difference when I eat something that may knock me out of ketosis. So it helps keep me on track. I took a pic of the two brands and as you can see this test shows ketones in higher amounts both tests taken at same time. Photo taken 20 seconds in. The other brand says 20 seconds this bottle says 40 (it got darker than this pic by 40 seconds. So we have a clear winner!
customer_reviews.author: Mesha

customer_reviews.title: THEY WORK
customer_reviews.text: Started Keto less than a week ago and I was already flashing moderate on day 2. I was a little skeptical so, I used my boyfriend as a guinea pig. This guy eats whatever he wants all day (was eating Bugles before he tested lol 😂) and you can see his on the left and mine on the right. I have been eating less than 20 carbs daily and around 5-15 when factoring just net. Be strict with yourself, don’t do the “low carb” products, and you can do it too!
customer_reviews.author: Pr0n_Queen

customer_reviews.title: hope it is accurate!!
customer_reviews.text: Looks that I've kicked in already?! I cannot believe it but happy with the result
customer_reviews.author: D.E.Fox

customer_reviews.title: They work!
customer_reviews.text: They work! New to this, but I had been following a keto diet for several days, and I wasn't entirely confident I was doing it correctly, so I ordered these for guidance. I tried them immediately and the first one reacted, changing to shade slightly lighter than "moderate" but darker than "small." Skeptical that they just change color when wet, I wet one with water as a control and it turned the tan "negative" shade. It's a a little tough to tell between the color shades, but for the price, it is an excellent way to know you're on the right track.
customer_reviews.author: Marisa

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality!
customer_reviews.text: I first used the strips and didn't get a reading, I tested in a stream of urine. I decided to try testing in a cup and the strips worked much better!
customer_reviews.author: ASHLEY L SIDEBOTHAM

customer_reviews.title: Worst product ever.
customer_reviews.text: These strips are useless! I have been doing ketone on and off for years with great results, I dont really need the strips but I thought I would give it a try to see how some food will spike ketones. Well, these crappy strips didnt make a change eventhough when I did fasting and did a heavy crossfit session. If I hate big time carbs or I have none they will show I have not reached a keto level. But I knew I did since I was losing easily .5 to 1 pound a day. I won't recomend these strips at all!
customer_reviews.author: carlis

customer_reviews.title: after a three day fast it did not change colors ...
customer_reviews.text: after a three day fast it did not change colors to indicate ketosis, tried a different brand that showed I was in ketosis- I gave some to two other people who are ketogenic and their tests came back no result too- somethings wrong with the ones I got- disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Corey Gilliland

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your cash.
customer_reviews.text: So I purchased these a few months ago. Unopened, stored in a dark cool bathroom cabinet away form water or anything like that. I kept thinking I wasn’t in ketosis. I thought I was doing something wrong because usually the strips tell me when I start producing ketones. Turns out NONE of these work. I grabbed another brand from Walmart AND borrowed one of my mother’s Medi-Weight Loss brand and both worked except for these. Ridiculous. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: MandyK

customer_reviews.title: Strips became unusable after about 30 days and read slightly higher than other strips.
customer_reviews.text: Despite the bottle saying that these strips are good for 6 months after opening, after about 30 days the strip became dark and unresponsive. We followed the directions on the bottle to keep them reactive longer, but it was no good. Additionally, we still had a bottle left when we first received these. We compared the readings on the ones we were using before and got a higher ketone reading with these strips, which may or may not have been the case but we thought it was a little odd so that's something to bear in mind. We will not be buying these again due to the strips becoming unusable so fast.
customer_reviews.author: S Dods

customer_reviews.title: Unusable if you want to know amount
customer_reviews.text: Do these detect ketones.... yes. But that’s it. If you want to know your general urine ketone levels than move on to another product. The color chart used to interpret ketone levels is way off. It is next to impossible to tell between trace, minimal, and moderate because the shade of pink matches nothing. Maybe if I was high or on psychotropic drugs I could figure it out.
customer_reviews.author: kazankota

customer_reviews.title: This product gives False negative readings - DIABETICS BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: If you are a diabetic, I would NOT use this brand to test for ketones. The color on the stick does not change even when ketones are present. I have simultaneously compared results from this brand with results from more than one other brand. The results from the other two brands were instantly ‘moderate’, while the test strip for this brand remained negative. (I have tested this on several occasions with the same results). I believe the color swatch is completely off. Needless to say, I threw both bottles I had purchased in the trash. A false read like this can cause very serious problems for a diabetic.
customer_reviews.author: kate drake

customer_reviews.title: These work, but all pee strips have a major issue
customer_reviews.text: These strips work, but you can't rely on them for determining if you're staying in ketosis. Strips are good for determining if you're getting into it at the beginning. It measures free ketones in your urine, which show up during the beginning stages. They decrease because you're using them, so they won't show up on the strip - don't freak out if your amount of ketones are appearing lighter and lighter, even though you've been strict with your carbs.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Not reliable
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because they were on sale and because I am new to Keto and thought they would be helpful. I found these to be incredibly unreliable. I have been following a STRICT keto diet for the past 2 weeks. I have not deviated from my diet at all. When using these I found it was dependant upon the strip used if it read I was in ketosis. I could literally use 2 different strips and get 2 different readings. Also, it's very unfortunate that the company did not respond to my email about the reliability of their product. The only positive is I didn't spend much on these. I would not recommend these to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Holls_RDH

customer_reviews.title: How do you know if it’s working???
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I just suck at keto but I haven’t registered any results in these. My macros have been on point and carbs under 20 grams most days (definitely under 30 pretty much every day). I work out 3 to 5 times a week, a combo of weights and cardio. I’ve been using Perfect Keto products too, including the base/salts once or twice a day, and still nothing. Same whether I pee right on them or use a cup. Maybe it’s a bad batch? Maybe it’s just me? But so far these are just kind of discouraging because I’m not seeing any results.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: They don't work.
customer_reviews.text: Fasted for 20hrs and used these strips to test for ketosis, negative. It was really disheartening. Rechecked with a medical grade strip and popped rock solidly positive immediately. This has happened every time I've tried these strips. Glad I had the medical grade strips as a control. These strips do not work.
customer_reviews.author: NP2B

customer_reviews.title: Accurate/fast, but they go bad quickly
customer_reviews.text: My old test strips were pretty old, so I ordered this brand instead. These are more accurate and turn very fast. Im using them to check ketosis during my 7 day water fast Update: May 24, 2020. I just bought my second bottle with this same Lot/exp date on it and within 2 weeks of opening they go bad. They were fine upon opening 5/17 - till yesterday 5/24. The first bottle failed at 2 weeks also. Wasnt reading any ketones when I have been high for 2 solid weeks and no diet irregularities. Im on an AIP diet and have to test daily. The company says good for 6 months after opening? I ordered an alternate brand
customer_reviews.author: Pamela A. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Good strips but I found they do not last nearly ...
customer_reviews.text: Good strips but I found they do not last nearly as long as advertised. I had a box go bad in 3 months (not providing accurate readings). I bought a second box and did a side by side test, and found the new box to be more accurate. A useful tools for those trying to get into ketosis, just know you'll have to buy more if you want to use them for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: A. Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Good while they worked, which was not long
customer_reviews.text: These worked fine for about the first 30 days and then all started reading negative. I confirmed I was in ketosis via blood test and with another brand strips. The picture shows this brand on the top and Nurse Hatty strip on the bottom. Same sample, completely different results. I’ve kept them closed tight in a drawer. The expiration date is not until 2020 but these have clearly stopped working. I thought I was out of ketosis until I went back and read the reviews. This seems to be an issue with these. I recommend steering clear.
customer_reviews.author: M.J.

customer_reviews.title: STRIPS DON’T MATCH BOTTLE COLOR CHART EVER!!!
customer_reviews.text: NOT CLEAR AT ALL. VERY HARD TO MATCH WITH BOTTLE... so after 40 seconds the strip will be (for example) purple but gave a ton of white spots in it... now when matching up to the solid color squares of the bottle you have no idea if it is reading 5 or 20 or 40 because of the white spots! The strips over the last week never match any color square in the bottle, ever... so you just have to think the more purple the better. EITHER WAY, the way and system the strips use is not accurate and DOES NOT WORK. BUY ANOTHER PRODUCT THAT ACTUALLY WORKS. The strips should be a 1 to 1 comparison, not a guess.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate shelf life
customer_reviews.text: These do a pretty decent job measuring ketosis however they are not good for 6 months after opening as the bottle says. Mine are not expired and only opened 5 months ago but stopped producing accurate results after about 4 months. The sticks became purple tinged in color even before use at about 5 months making it difficult to accurately interpret the readings. I even left the desiccant in as instructed and sealed tightly. I bought another bottle to compare and the old ones are definitely bad.
customer_reviews.author: JamieLeah

customer_reviews.title: Only last weeks after opening
customer_reviews.text: These worked as indicated when first opened. The bottle states to use within 6 months of opening. The time frame is less than a month. They all turn brown and don’t register any ketones after that time. The Bayer ones from the bricks and mortar stores do last 6 months after opening, usually longer, but they are more expensive. You decide if the trade off is worth it for you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon fan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works as described without issue. Appears quite accurate from my experience.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Richmond

customer_reviews.title: Failed quickly
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these after trying a different brand. They worked great at first (I received mine August 17th) but now they're consistently negative and I'm certain they're not right. The bottle hasn't reached its expiration date and I've only had them open less than 4 months where they say to replace them after 6 months. Pretty disappointed as I still have a lot left in the bottle! EDIT 7/18/20: switched to Nurse Hatty brand  and, lo & behold, they showed I was very much still in ketosis. Much more reliable and just feel like much better quality. I get the long stick version.
customer_reviews.author: PrimeFan

customer_reviews.title: Try another brand
customer_reviews.text: I’m pretty disappointed in these strips, at first they worked well but then I noticed they weren’t even reading a negative read. I came on and checked the reviews and come to find out a majority of people say they stopped working. I’ve had them since s December and use often and now that they just stopped working I’m curious if they even were giving an accurate reading to begin with. I’d go with something else!
customer_reviews.author: Linds

customer_reviews.title: Buy something else
customer_reviews.text: I used and stored these as directed. I’d remove a strip and immediately put the lid back on tight. Worked well for two or three weeks then became totally useless. Wouldn’t change color one bit even though I knew I was in ketosis. Very frustrating as my first thought was that I ate something I shouldn’t have. There’s another brand sold on Amazon, more expensive and long shipping time as they come from the UK... but they WORK. Believe the one star reviews about these things.
customer_reviews.author: Stan

customer_reviews.title: Unsatisfied
customer_reviews.text: Only a handful the the strips worked the rest of them were this weird dark grey color out of the container and never changed colors nor did the test strip color ever match any of the colors on the bottle. Their cheap, but so frustrating that they aren’t worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie81

customer_reviews.title: Testing strips changed colors after 1 week
customer_reviews.text: I used these to show if I was in ketosis. At first they worked great but I noticed that after one week, the testing area was discolored. All the test results show I was in the moderate "purple". I suspected that the readings were erroneous, so I purchased another type at my local drug store. A side by side comparison indicated that I was not in ketosis, yet the perfect keto strips showed that I was. And for the record, I followed their storage instructions to the letter.
customer_reviews.author: tede60

customer_reviews.title: Be prepared to not keep these around long.
customer_reviews.text: I used this to check for ketosis on the Keto diet. They worked well for the first month, and then the color began to fade. The color was still readable, but eventually by month 5, there’s barely a change and I’ve checked with new strips from another brand that tell me I am in ketosis-while these strips barely register. They say a 6 month shelf life. I’ve never seen a shelf life be so literal.
customer_reviews.author: Cabbyann

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed.
customer_reviews.text: Not overly impressed with the quality. Color template is not accurate. As with other test strips I’ve used, the color results run a spectrum of pale pink to a dark magenta, the color range on the bottle of this product is very orange. I ended up keeping an old bottle of another brand just to match the results to. Results are in 40 seconds - compared to 15 of others I’ve used. And there’s a reason they say to dip these sticks rather than pass them through the stream...because the test pad easily comes off if you do the latter. Overall I would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Pickett

customer_reviews.title: Works well & easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I have only started using Perfect Keto testing strips, but I found them very easy to use. It takes under a minute to get a definitive answer to my current keytone level. They are a very economical alternative to using a meter. Although less accurate a meter, I feel I'm well served with an approximation that gives me a relative answer to previous ketone tests. I'm interested if my keytone level is going up or down and by a magnitude of difference.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Owens

customer_reviews.title: So helpful
customer_reviews.text: I have dabbled in and out of the keto diet for 2 years. I use urine strips to confirm I am (finally) in ketosis or to make sure I haven't cheated to much and I am staying in ketosis. I have used these and also another brand and they are both excellent. You can pee directly on them and they change color instantly (but look at them 30-40 seconds later for the final darkness). Just be aware that all the brands only work for a few months. Bottle says 6 months, but after 3 I don't get any purple anymore. But for $7 every 3 months for a successful/healthy diet I just replace the bottle. Amazon ships quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Patti S

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working, shortly after opening..
customer_reviews.text: I was new to keto dieting and wanted to measure how successful I was at getting into ketosis...I ordered and used these strips...Perhaps the first 10 seemed to work, but then they did not...The only color change would be to a color that wasn't even on the chart...I thought perhaps I was dieting wrong, until I got another brand of strip and found that I was in ketosis...I handled these strips properly...They just stopped working..I certainly would not suggest trying to use these...
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Eacret

customer_reviews.title: Substandard Product UPDATE JUNE 2020
customer_reviews.text: THIS REVIEW WILL BE IDENTICAL TO THE LAST: These keto sticks are substandard. The last two bottles I have purchased don't last through the recommended expiration. I am lucky to use 75-80% before they begin to fail. You get what you pay for, I guess. I mean they're cheap. REALLY CHEAP. STAY AWAY FROM THESE, TRY SOMETHING ELSE!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These stopped working after a few weeks.
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was failing to manage any ketone output for two weeks of pretty strict dieting. On a hunch I tried a ketostix brand one which I found in an almost empty pack at the bottom of a drawer at the same time as one of these. Lo the ketostix lit up 4/5 while the Prefect Keto strip showed nada. In the bin they went. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: David Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Went bad in 5 days...updated, THEYRE GOOD!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know if these are accurate. I received these on a Saturday, opened the bottle Monday and tested dark purple for ketosis on Wednesday. The test strips were original all white but this morning (Saturday) when I opened them they were a yellowish orange on the test point. Now I’m questioning if I really am in keto or if I have false readings. I’m going to try another brand. $8 gone down the drain smh Edited. I am adjusting my rating to 5 stars. I got my Nurse Hatty keto strips today and did a test of each brand to compare and they are the same. So it doesn’t seem that the discoloring of the strip had an effect.
customer_reviews.author: Love

customer_reviews.title: They did not work and I’ve been using them for the past three months
customer_reviews.text: They did not work and I’ve been using them for the past three monthsI wanted to give them a really good review but after using them for the past three months I am I do not know how to say this but they never last that I am all my readings were negative and I was like I’m a bit surprised since I’m doing a low-carb diet
customer_reviews.author: Nour

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with these
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I do keto and wanted to test. I normally go to the local CVS and buy them. However, everyone raves about this product so I thought I would give it a try. I know for a fact that I’m In ketosis and these strips don’t show that. They are all literally white everyday. Maybe I got a lemon batch,
customer_reviews.author: Coona$$buyer

customer_reviews.title: Only Last 3 Months
customer_reviews.text: These worked GREAT for a whole 3 months, then the strips turned this grayish color and stopped working. The bottle says use within 6 months of opening but it’s lame that they stopped working after just 3 months. I KNEW i was in Ketosis but they didn’t change color very much. I used 5 at the same time and each one was a different color.
customer_reviews.author: MrsBernal8

customer_reviews.title: Worked well for weeks
customer_reviews.text: I bought these a few days into my Keto Diet. They worked well for about 5 weeks to show me when I was in Ketosis ( about 6 days a week ) and when I was not ( usually about 24 hours after cheating on a Saturday night ). Easy to use. Clearly shows no ketosis as a peach color, and then it gradually turns maroon/purple as your keto levels rise. However they must have gotten contaminated because at one point they just started turning grey....not even any color on the Keto chart, so I had to throw out the last 30 or 40 of them.
customer_reviews.author: monica

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Work
customer_reviews.text: Simply doesn't work. After 5 days of extremely low carb dieting, these sticks don't measure anything. Couldn't figure it out. Shelled out the $50 for a breath tester and sure enough, it shows that I am definitely in ketosis. Right after that tested again with these strips. Hardly changes color. I know I'm in ketosis. I know how it feels. These simply don't work.
customer_reviews.author: Rizen

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money!
customer_reviews.text: Strips worked for about 2 weeks. I had to throw the whole bottle away after a few weeks because all of the strips turned brown and none of them would read my keytones. Kept in a cool dark place along side my keto strips purchased from the drug store. Those still work just fine and I purchased them at the same time. Very dissapointed.
customer_reviews.author: Monique B

customer_reviews.title: They don’t work
customer_reviews.text: They suck! I eat and it shows the same indication as when I don’t eat for 24 hours... no trace of ketones. I must have gotten a bad/old batch. I can’t imagine that I’m not in ketosis after 24 hours of not eating.
customer_reviews.author: PownerL

customer_reviews.title: worked great but then turned gray
customer_reviews.text: They were working fine for months and then I sealed and put them away for a 3 months while I was off keto and they turned gray and don't work even though the expiration date says they are still good. I don't know why they turned gray, the are sealed in the bottle, which I placed in the box inside a dark bathroom cabinet. They haven't been exposed to anything. Not sure what happened but kinda bummed I have to buy new ones.
customer_reviews.author: Misha LeeTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money, don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought these & they worked okay AT FIRST. a few months later they stopped working, I had a ton of them left. I emailed the company & they said you aren’t supposed to leave them in the bathroom because of humidity. Okay? Isn’t that where everyone uses them? Why wouldn’t I leave them in the bathroom. Long story short, they were no help and I ended up throwing them away. Waste of money & this company sucks.
customer_reviews.author: V Scarlett

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Keto Strips
customer_reviews.text: I bought these strips from the Seller who delivered exactly what they advertised and by the delivery date. I've been using these strips ever since they arrived. It appears they are working. When I compared the color strip indicator on the side of the box with the strip with my urine on it (I test my urine on a daily basis). The color on the strip has changed to indicate I'm am getting closer to Ketosis state. I like these strips. They are perfect for a beginner Keto person trying to get to Ketosis state.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Updated - they stopped working
customer_reviews.text: The strips are accurate and fast, and do what I need them to do. Update: most of these ended up in the trash. A month or so in, the colors on the test strips stopped working and were not matching the comparable guide at all, and at some point it became impossible to read them due to the color fading. I grabbed my original go to brand of test strips to compare and make sure it wasn't a user error. Perfect Keto strips just kind of stopped working,despite being stored and used correctly. Not planning on buying these again.
customer_reviews.author: J Noel

customer_reviews.title: Great.  Inexpensive.  Make sure they dont expire
customer_reviews.text: Ok. If i would have written a review a week ago it would have had like 1 star. BUT I never read the instructions well...The expiration date of these is really important. Even though i kept them out of sunlight, in a drawer and dry for 1.5 years...they of course expired. When they expire the color on the strip will not change at all. So if you’re trying to get into ketosis and it keep showing as zero ketones found it can be super frustrating. I ordered a new package, did the first test and BAM in medium to high ketosis. Super easy...cheap...been testing 2x per day.
customer_reviews.author: patrick doerrie

customer_reviews.title: Ok keto strip
customer_reviews.text: I did the keto diet for about 2 months and purchased these testing strips to make sure I was staying in ketosis. I used the strips in the evening and the reading was always different (some days it said I had no ketones, some days it said I was high in ketones) although my diet stayed consistent the entire duration of the keto diet as I tracked my macros. I would not use this brand again
customer_reviews.author: luba

customer_reviews.title: Seem to do the job for long enough
customer_reviews.text: These seem to work jut fine. I feel like my bottle was a little older, so when I went off then back on to keto, the strips were turning a grayish color (not negative or trace). The bottle had been opened in June and it is now September, so perhaps to be expected after opening and closing for such a long period of time. I'm getting a new bottle and hopefully they will respond the same way this one did early on. Good for confirming you're in ketosis, but remember they don't help you indicate a state of ketosis forever, as your body adjusts and learns to use the free ketones that these sticks measure instead of excreting them.
customer_reviews.author: Lar

customer_reviews.title: They go back very quickly 1-2 weeks.
customer_reviews.text: So these are a complete waste of money. They work when you first open the bottle but after a couple weeks the test strips turned dark brownish blackish and don’t change color when urine touches it. So it you want to buy 100 strips and maybe only use 10-15 before they stop working. The bottle says use within 6 months after opening and the expiration date isn’t until 2021. They’re only good for a week or 2 after opening. This is the second time I have bought them thinking the first time was a fluke but nope they deteriorate fast once Oxygen hit them.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: Not the best ones I've used...
customer_reviews.text: For some reason, the colors are very weird. They never seem to match and it's hard to identify the colors, especially on the lower/trace end. I have another set from another company that are dead on. Probably will not by these again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm! So cool!!
customer_reviews.text: I've never used ketone testing strips before but I'm obsessed!! It's such peace of mind to know that few glasses of wine here or a bite there aren't sabotaging my low carb efforts. So glad to have discovered this easy to use product.
customer_reviews.author: Jane  Stiegman

customer_reviews.title: Perhaps this is not bunk
customer_reviews.text: This product gets a lot of good reviews. Here is my experience: Three days into a Fasting Mimicking Diet (FMD), which should have put me into Keto at three days, I stopped eating for the next two days. Using the keto strips three times per day, the color not only did not match for any ketones but didn't even match the zero mark; it turned a gray color. WHAT? Maybe just old product. WHO knows? But have to say that my first experience with these keto strips using 3 per day times 5 days or 15 strips is that they are not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Kaiser

customer_reviews.title: Faulty
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband and he has used them the last couple of days with a negative ketosis result. Read other reviews that said the tabs were already yellowed, so checked ours as well. They are exactly the same, all yellowed at the tab. Not effective and not a good product. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Drumheller

customer_reviews.title: I can't read it since the color is not anything like the strip on bottle.
customer_reviews.text: I can't read it. The color of the test is not anywhere near the scale of colors. I can't tell if I am in Ketosis -- which is the main reason I bought it. I would like to return it as I've don't two strips and they just don't work. 0
customer_reviews.author: gramma raine

customer_reviews.title: Just skip them
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure they work. I did the Adkins diet eating less than 20 net grams of carbs a day and I would barely be in Ketosis but my mom would use a test and test very high in ketosis after eating a cupcake a few days previous. My step dad had the same problem. He was more strict than any of us and according to the test he was never in ketosis. Maybe I just don’t know how ketosis works completely and you can still thrive on this lifestyle without it, but it was discouraging to say the least. I almost always allowed myself to fall off the wagon after getting a reading I didn’t like.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Color doesnt match any of those on the chart
customer_reviews.text: I honestly don't think this product works at all. It never has and I keep using it hoping that one day it will work. I am in keto, that is for sure. My total carbs are under 25g per day. No sugar, super picky about artificial sugars and scrutinize every ingredient. I've lost 50+ pounds and it's working, it's a shame these sticks do not. Not once have they turned a color that is indicated on the chart. I've thought maybe it was sorta like one of the chart colors but it's never been close enough to say for sure. I'm pretty disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Cook

customer_reviews.title: Returned..
customer_reviews.text: Even though I had Keto breath and knew I was in ketosis, it was hard to convince these strips. Sometimes they would be 1/2 and 1/2 but most of the time they showed as negative. Disappointing to work so hard at something and then get negative readings regularly. Sent them back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 100 fun peeing sessions
customer_reviews.text: These worked great for my son and I -- we are doing keto together and his results were darker than mine multiple times. So these are good at determining ketosis as well as the level of ketones. And they are a great motivator. This isn't my first rodeo, and these are just as good as the last ones I had purchased from a large chain drug store. Spend the extra dollar if these are more expensive than another questionable brand. You'll get a hundred fun peeing sessions.
customer_reviews.author: Generic Name

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: These are worthless. They barely worked after opening and within two weeks stopped working altogether. They wouldn't change color at all. I verified these accuracy of these with "Ketostix" as well as a blood glucose and ketone monitor. Don't waste your money. What's especially disappointing is that people using these can sometimes have medical conditions that need to be monitored. False information like this is down right DANGEROUS!!!
customer_reviews.author: philip e grapatin

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after a few days.
customer_reviews.text: This product stopped working just a few days after I bought it. At first it showed the lighter colors, but currently they do not react in any way that shows the colors on the bottle. These only show a gray color, one that isn’t even on their sheet. I have another set of Keto strips I’ve been using concurrently that do change colors, similar to what is on the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Cara Brennan

customer_reviews.title: Not Good
customer_reviews.text: These did not work for me. Just turned gray when testing. Threw away.
customer_reviews.author: Coco

customer_reviews.title: Not working at all.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to test my progress on Keto. Just started because wife is doing it and working well for her. Cannot get it to read anything other then NEG for ketones. She has been on it for 3 months and lost tons of weight, and is quite religious about staying under 20 carbs a day. Reads neg for her.
customer_reviews.author: Polytechnical

customer_reviews.title: Still Not 100% Convinced
customer_reviews.text: I'm still not quite convinced on these. Most of the time my registered color isn't on the chart, it looks like I'm close to a few different options, but not one being more apparent than the other, and not one being close enough to one to distinguish where I fall. I kinda gave up on it.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Hough

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for the first month or so.
customer_reviews.text: After a while, the strips started taking longer to turn, didnt turn as dark. The strips were kept tightly sealed and in the dark. Not bad for the price. The product was manufactured in 2018.
customer_reviews.author: april

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: I had been forewarned that these might not be very efficient -- and they aren't. Even when I know I am in full ketosis (which I do through other means), these aren't necessarily correct. So I would probably stay away from these as your option for review.
customer_reviews.author: JHammeresq

customer_reviews.title: Stronger colors
customer_reviews.text: I really like that it is easy to use. But unless its purple and your in moderate to high ketosis it's very hard to tell what pink you're at, it looks peach. But the night before I was at dark purple and I didn't eat over my 20-25 "healthy carb" limit. So this threw me off and caused me to waste multiple sticks. I wish the color variations were stronger. Just my opinion, other then that their cool and easy to use & come in a nice box and container.
customer_reviews.author: Bree S.

customer_reviews.title: Defective Strips and No Remedy or Response from Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I clearly got a defective batch of Ketone Strips. I purchased back in March and kept in my medicine cabinet until I was ready to commit to the Keto diet. Once I was on the diet a couple of weeks I went ahead an pulled out to begin testing whether or not I was in Ketosis and every single one of the strips appeared to have been 'activated' in some way meaning the tips weren't white/beige. I contacted the manufacturer to request a replacement batch be sent but no response. The product and their customer service is trash.
customer_reviews.author: A Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Bad test strips
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed in this product. I opened it up and the test strips were already black. It says they expire in January 24 of 2020. They were manufactured on January 25 of 2018. I would’ve expected fresher strips. I would not order this product again. Also, the color chart on the side is not very accurate. The color chart on the side of the bayer keto diasticks or the true plus Keytone strips is much more accurate. either of those 2 are a far superior product. This was a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: CookieLady

customer_reviews.title: they don't work
customer_reviews.text: all the positive reviews are more than a year old, I've bought this twice now and not one time have I measured anything into ketosis, which is not possible. I've been taking in less than 20 carbs for weeks and was previously with first bottle of strips. I've also had others use them, that have tested positive in ketosis, but nothing with these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only accurate at start of ketosis and never precise
customer_reviews.text: If you are into monitoring ketosis, go for blood-based techniques rather than losing time with this method. After a short period, the body reduces the excretion of ketone bodies in the urine, losing all the purpose of urine strips. Additionally, the precision is awful, giving too much uncertainty (~2mmol/L)
customer_reviews.author: WildFish

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if accurate
customer_reviews.text: I've been on very strict Keto for 7 days, I've lost 12 lbs, confirmed. But these keto testing strips are not showing any definitive results. I am a hospital laboratory technician, I am very familiar with how testing strips work. The fact that I'm not getting any result with these strips after a week and convincing weight loss is unsettling. I'll give it a few more days then I'll go to my urologist for confirmation.
customer_reviews.author: AGATINA

customer_reviews.title: They stop working over time.
customer_reviews.text: These worked well when I first got them, at least that’s what I thought. I noticed I was deep dark KETOSIS after eating trashy over the holidays. Out of curiosity I ran the stick under tap water and that got a dark KETOSIS reading as well. My package is not expired or anything. They simply stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Basco-Daniels

customer_reviews.title: Expired before expiration date.
customer_reviews.text: 1 star because every strip is now a purplish-grey color, and no longer work. They worked perfectly prior to this. It has been two weeks since last using them, they were a peachy color. I stored in the same place as always, these were purchased in January 2019.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Seem to expire too quickly once opened
customer_reviews.text: They work easily and are really easy to use but only for a month or so.... then they just stopped showing anything. The color was simply off. I ordered another bottle thinking maybe the lid wasn’t on tight....it’s been since August and they stopped being effective a week or so ago.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Went bad fast
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought several kinds of these and these strips went bad within a week or two. None of them would turn. I bought another bottle of the Reli-Ons and they worked better. I will not buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Krysta

customer_reviews.title: Does not seem to register any changes in ketones.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if I got a lemon container or what, these test strips do not seem to change no matter what I'm doing. Always just stays the original color, even when I KNOW that I'm in ketosis. I'm going to try another brand and see if I can post some side by side results.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonMom

customer_reviews.title: Started out ok
customer_reviews.text: At first, they were great- worked like a charm. Then i got fat adapted and they stopped working- this makes sense because ketone stop showing up after you are adapted. Then, after a 2-month hiatus, they only showed greyish color when i went back on full keto. A waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Keely B.

customer_reviews.title: Awful!
customer_reviews.text: These test strips do not work! I don't know if it is possible for these to expire or what but from day one (And at that time I was doing Keto for about 6 months already) these never once changed color. YEs, I read the instructions and followed all of them. I only purchased to monitor what foods I could do to really dial in my ketones. Again, from day one, these never worked. I have tried other strips (on the same day) that showed my levels just fine. I would NOT recommend the product.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hollis

customer_reviews.title: I don't trust the accuracy.
customer_reviews.text: I used these strips and they have consistently shown I am in ketosis. I started getting suspicious, though, because they always turned the exact same color, at any time of day. So, stuck one under tap water, and it turned to the exact same color. I don't trust them.
customer_reviews.author: G Guy

customer_reviews.title: False reading sales tactic to buy exogenous ketones
customer_reviews.text: These are terrible! They always give a negative reading. I’ve done keto consistently for 2 years and have lost and maintained my 80 lb weight loss by knowing exactly how to get into ketosis and stay there. These are incredibly misleading... says you’re not in ketosis when you are! How convenient that on the side of the bottle the company is advertising their “exogenous ketones” to get you into ketosis faster...sales tactic.
customer_reviews.author: Shellie

customer_reviews.title: Never got my free product / or 50% off
customer_reviews.text: I don’t have anything bad to say about the keto strips itself but there was a get another pack free or half off , which I was Gonna use , I went To their internet site perfect keto.com/free .. gave them all the information they asked for to get Why I picked ... I never Actually got a mail which lets me get the free product or half off ... but it automatically started a subscription.. so now i receive emails which would be fine ..if i would’ve got what i was promised as well ..
customer_reviews.author: Tyrone Hodge

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase. I know a lot of people are against urine test strips for testing ketones because it’s not accurate, but you get what you pay for. I’m not paying more money just to prick my finger every day. I did my research and came across a couple articles where the writer does a trial to see how 3 different ways of testing ketones levels compare to each other and each article shows the urine test strips are not far off from blood test strips. So I’m okay with estimating my ketones level for the price I’m paying. This is a good product!
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: Only worked for 6 weeks!
customer_reviews.text: These strips were only accurate for the first 6 weeks, after that they didn't register any Ketones at all. I kept the bottle closed at all times and at a constant temperature of 77 degrees. They should have worked for at least 90 days after opening.
customer_reviews.author: Keto Girl

customer_reviews.title: Garbage. Save your money.
customer_reviews.text: These strips worked for about a week and now they show a purple-ish gray no matter whether they're dipped in urine or kool-aid. Finally just broke down and bought a blood ketone monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Hello World

customer_reviews.title: I’ll pass
customer_reviews.text: No accuracy! You can use the same urine on 5 strips and get 5 different colors! The color chart is so close it’s hard to tell what color matches and just simply did not work
customer_reviews.author: Val (Bubbles)

customer_reviews.title: Stopped reading after two months
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these in Mid-May. I use them about twice a week. Initially I was getting accurate readings. Then, only the palest pink reading on the far left of the scale. I thought maybe I wasn't in ketosis, but now realize that the entire container is "dead" and not providing any reading at all. I have more than half the container left. Although I thought the product was a bargain, it obviously isn't worth the cost if they last such a brief time. BTW, I have used strips for years, and know how to use them and protect from light and contamination. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Whelan

customer_reviews.title: the strips don't change color regardless of food intake
customer_reviews.text: the strips were the same color, no change on strip indicating no ketones in urine. I used the strips during my feeding window & they showed no ketones. I'm not on a strict ketone diet. My wife consumes a SAD [STANDARD AMERICAN DIET] with high refined carb intake & she tried one of the strips with no ketones indicated in urine.. I should have heeded all the 1 star reviews with the same result. FOLLOWED THE DIRECTIONS LISTED...
customer_reviews.author: ron j lambert

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Legit readings.
customer_reviews.text: To make sure they worked I tested myself before starting keto & everyday after. I don’t know if it’s because I work out a lot but I had “small” amounts of ketones in my urine by second day & they kept gradually increasing. All in all great product. In fact, I was so impressed that my mother is starting Keto as well & I got her these. So glad I went with this brand. I know that when my body becomes “used” to the ketones in my body they won’t register, but it’s a great product for people trying to get into ketosis or back into it after falling off the horse.
customer_reviews.author: Double L

customer_reviews.title: Cost effective and helpful
customer_reviews.text: These are the only keto strips I've ever gotten so I have nothing to compare them to; however, they have been a great help in my path to a new lifestyle. I love knowing if I'm in ketosis and how much. I'm just starting keto, so it helps so much seeing that what I'm doing is working. I can't explain the satisfaction ofseing the color change and know that I'm doing it right. Thanks Perfect Keto!!
customer_reviews.author: Jodi McDaniel

customer_reviews.title: Good for about a month.
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd brand I've ordered, SlapFat was first, only lasted a month as well, then Nurse Hatty, the same lasting time. Now with Perfect KETO as my 3rd brand choice, I have found these strips just don't last very long. Here I am again working so hard to get into KETO, and the strips are only 1 month old and they seem to be loosing their ability to do their job. Can there be a better stability than 1 month? The bottle was kept closed tight and careful to not touch other strips.
customer_reviews.author: Tina N.

customer_reviews.title: Happy to see instant results.
customer_reviews.text: Got these just for trial. I am in my 3rd day of keto diet and wanted to see if it was really working. I started using the test strips from day one and noticed the results are negative. On day 2 there was a slight change in test result and on day 3 i can say the results are positive. I am consuming around 50 carbs per day and the diet has been pretty successful. I think you need to go well below 50 carbs to get to the last result.
customer_reviews.author: Tejas Vernekar

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This was dumb. The resulting color on the strip didn't even match any colors on the bottle. Uninformative and a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Yeah! What a relief...!
customer_reviews.text: I know when we're doing Keto that the strip is not the be all and end all. But the fact is, I love testing and recording stuff. It's in my blood (no pun intended). I've been through several brands, including just "going local" to Walmart's pharmacy area, and each purchase was a disappointment. However, Perfect Keto Testing Strips DO appear to be superior! I'm old school, so yes I want all 40 seconds because I do. "Quick" isn't my style. I like to savor (LOL!) victories! So thank you PK for making a fine strip that works just as it should!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: After a few they all went bad
customer_reviews.text: Seem to work the first few days but then they all stopped working. I stored them as instructed but they still went bad
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't change color
customer_reviews.text: I have been doing keto, on and off for over 4 years. And now i decided to buy this brand. They never change colors. I have different other methods to check if I'm in ketosis. This one is not accurate at all or I got a defective product
customer_reviews.author: M. Sada

customer_reviews.title: Simple and (mostly) accurate
customer_reviews.text: These are better than most keto strips I have used. A common problem is that the color scale on the label doesn't actually match the color on the strip so you have to guess. These ones are pretty close. One problem is that after about three months or so opened in the bathroom the strips stop changing color so it seems like you aren't in ketosis when you really are. The label says use within six months of opening but mine didn't last that long.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Test strips have been very helpful for me, a ...
customer_reviews.text: Test strips have been very helpful for me, a beginner to get a visual on my progress and increase my confidence as I learn more about the Kito lifestyle. It is helping identity how different foods impact my Kito state and how long it takes to get back to Keto. It is so exciting to see the color stick get closer to the pink color. I don't check as often now but it definitely helped me get going. So appreciate having this. I just can't figure out what they mean by shocking your urine.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Was sold expired strips
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in October used them and never got a positive reading.. I became so frustrated I stopped keto.. started my keto again in November and tried to strips again and the same result even though I was keeping a strict eye on my food intake. I did some research and like others have reviewed, the strips weren’t white out of the bottle they are an off color white then I looked at the expiration date and they expire in January of 2020 🤬
customer_reviews.author: HL302

product_meta.title: Perfect Keto Ketone Testing Strips: Test Ketosis Levels on Low Carb Ketogenic Diet, 100 Urinalysis Tester Strips Best for Accurate Meter Measurement of Urine Ketones Tests: by Perfect Keto
feature_bullets: ✅ MEASURE KETONES: Perfect Keto Test Strips are used for measuring whether you’re in ketosis based on ketones in your urine. It’s easier to use than a glucose blood meter or breath analyzer monitor.

✅ RELIABLE: Count on this doctor developed, high-quality testing kit to give you results with precision. Unlike other products, these are convenient and easy to use at home, at work, or during travel.
✅ QUICK RESULTS: Just pee on a strip, or in a cup and dip the strip. Tap off excess urine, then wait 40-60 seconds. Compare the dipstick’s color to our chart to determine if you’re in ketosis.
✅ BULK KIT: 100 precision keto tester strips per bottle. If you test and monitor once per day, you can do urinalysis testing for 3 months plus with this one package. They’re best for women or men.
✅ NEW TO KETO? Sticks are great to see your progress on getting your body into ketosis. They can also measure ketones for those on low carb diets such as Atkins

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
